title: BitcoinPenny
author: BitcoinPenny
created_time: June 28, 2022, 10:26:03 PMLast edit: June 29, 2022, 01:26:25 PM by BitcoinPenny
content: (More photos are coming soon.)“PROTECT YOUR PRIVATE KEYS, NINJA!” with an exclusive set of the all new D.I.Y. Bitcoin Penny® Ninja Star Tactical Wallets (3-Pack)!The Bitcoin Penny® Ninja Star Tactical Wallets are the sequel to our original T.K.O. Tactical Knuckle Offline Wallet and the next project in our PYPK series of tactical offline wallets!Made of solid copper, hand-stamped, and hand-finished here at TBPCo., the new Bitcoin Penny® Ninja Star Tactical Wallets are the best way to guarantee your bitcoin funds are always in safe hands. That is, until they leave your hands! Available as a set of three classic ninja star shapes — 4-Point, 5-Point, and 6-Point. Included is a black zippered tactical pouch for easy and convenient carry.Only while supplies last!PriceThe price is $229 USD per Set (3-Pack) + shipping (or equivalent in BTC, LTC, ETH, or DOGE).Shipping is $5 USA or $20 International (non-USA).PaymentWe happily accept Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Roocoin (ROO). PayPal may be accepted on an individual member basis upon request. PM to inquire.Please make all BTC payments to the following addresses only: 1TBPCoEc2MYiQtjT4xduZjAqCBjPhTNDh or 3E1D38LZMCptFv2GLH1dkWz6YoHXif9txt.Make a point (or four or five or six) to Protect Your Private Keys from would-be crypto thieves with our new Bitcoin Penny® Ninja Star Offline Wallets (3-Pack)!Regards,Chris @ The Bitcoin Penny Companywww.BitcoinPenny.comDISCLAIMER: Customers are responsible for knowing their own federal, state, and local laws. Bitcoin Penny® Ninja Star Offline Wallets are for display and/or entertainment purposes only. Do not throw Bitcoin Penny® Ninja Star Offline Wallets. Throwing Bitcoin Penny® Ninja Star Offline Wallets could result in injury, death, or tearful nostalgia of lost youth.

PayPal may be accepted on an individual member basis upon request. PM to inquire.Please make all [b]BTC[/b] payments to the following addresses only: [b]1TBPCoEc2MYiQtjT4xduZjAqCBjPhTNDh[/b] or [b]3E1D38LZMCptFv2GLH1dkWz6YoHXif9txt[/b].(Added above in the OP too.)Thanks for the support, everyone! PMs on the way.Regards,Chris@TBPCo.

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: Quote from: ZipReg on June 29, 2022, 01:08:03 AMAny idea how many of these sets will be available Chris? I can't commit right at this moment but do want, thanks!Hiya, ZipReg.Great question! We originally made 100 sets. However, we've used a few sets to experiment with different finishes, stamping techniques, and aerodynamic characteristics. After all the testing, I believe the unofficial number of available sets is somewhere around 95, give or take. Plenty for everyone! On a different note, I'd like to thank everyone for all the positive interest in this new project. We still have several sets available, so order now while supplies last.Thanks again, everyone! Regards,Chris@TBPCo.

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Thanks buddy  will reach out asap for a set.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Any update? I paid awhile ago but no reply to my message asking for tracking.

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: Sorry for my absence lately, everyone. I've been working on five different BP® projects that should all be released within the next 4 weeks. Ugh! So much work. But still not enough to properly excuse my lack of replies. That's just my naturally forgetful mind. PreciousMetapsICT: Your order was shipped a few days ago, and USPS says that it's out for delivery, so it should arrive today. There was a slight delay due to questions about the bead blasted finish. The bead blasted finish looks a little nicer than the brushed finish that I originally wanted, so we went with that for the release. However, we found out that the bead blasted finish is super delicate and shows every little scrape and scuff. So after some experiments, we switched back to a 1200g brushed finish, which is a good compromise of the two finishes, I think. Fine enough to be attractive, but easy to re-finish yourself with a little bit of 0000 steel wool or a bottle of Brasso. But in appreciation of your patience, each of the original orders of 3 stars went out with an extra 4th star. The 4th star is considered a factory second / blemished item, so you won't have to feel bad if it gets scuffed or dinged by whatever you might choose to do with it...and the tree in your backyard. Thank you, FattCatt. In the meantime, please look forward to a big multi-projects update later today, and thank you again for flying BP® Airlines.Regards,Chris@TBPCo.

comments.body: ReceivedReally like the included carrying case!! Thanks for another quality product sir.
